name: Sync New Files From Google Drive with Airtable

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content: This node retrieves the newly added file from the specified folder in Google Drive.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content: This node sends the fetched file via email to the specified recipient.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content: This node stores the file’s metadata (name, ID, creation time, modification time, and recipient email) in Airtable.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content: ### Automatic File Upload & Sharing Workflow with Google Drive & Airtable Integration

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note4

parameters.content:
### Description:
This workflow automatically fetches newly uploaded files from a specific folder in Google Drive, shares them via email with specified recipients, and logs the file details (name, ID, created time, modified time) into Airtable for easy tracking. It streamlines the process of file sharing and management while keeping track of important metadata in a central place.)

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Sync New Files From Google Drive with Airtable

## Overview
Automated workflow: Sync New Files From Google Drive with Airtable. This workflow integrates 5 different services: stickyNote, googleDriveTrigger, airtable, googleDrive, stopAndError. It contains 10 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 10
- **Node Types**: 5
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Share File with Recipient**: googleDrive
- ** Log File Metadata**: airtable
- **Google Drive**: googleDriveTrigger
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note2**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note3**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note4**: stickyNote
- **Error Handler for f648b663**: stopAndError
- **Error Handler for f2a4c6af**: stopAndError

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
